pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-io-wrapper=================Early version of a Python 3 wrapper for a file-like object. Currentlysupports only raw (binary) objects, but text will come soon. Implementany missing methods from io.RawIOBase.# Usage```from io_wrapper import RawIOWrapper...new_stream = RawIOWrapper(my_file_like_object)```## LicenseThis package is in the Public Domain. See UNLICENSE.md for details.
